attributes.action: Stop Calais Migrants from entering the United Kingdom
attributes.background: The Calais Migration crisis should be used as an excuse for further immigration into the United Kingdom. The UK was never consulted on mass immigration or the transformation of our country, our culture and our way of life. We propose that Calais Migration is prohibited permanently.

rejection.details:
We think this petition could be interpreted as asking for an end to all non-UK nationals being allowed to enter the UK through the port of Calais.  You may wish to revise it to make it clearer what the petition is asking for.

If you would like to redraft and resubmit your petition it will be reconsidered.
